q1: I heard the Croatian team did really well in the World Cup, is that true?
a2: Yes they have very good players (Modric, Rakitic, Mandzukic, Rebic, Perisic) It was very impressive how they got to the finals. Awesome team.
q3: Will they do as well in the next world cup?
a3: If they can keep the momentum going.
q4: Who is the next Croatian wonder kid coming up soon?
q5: Will Croatia go on to better things after there World Cup display
a5: Yes I think they will, they have the potential to do so.
